name: LANON Cut Resistant Gloves, Knife Protection Level D, Nitrile Coating with Honey Comb Pattern, ANSI A4 Cut Work Gloves, Reinforced Thumbs, 3D Comfort Fit, Breathable, Mechanical, Touchscreen,XL
short_description: HPPE
Imported

Superior Cut Protection - LANON cut resistant gloves are made of HPPE (High-Performance Polyethylene) and metal yarn combination, and have honeycomb nitrile foam coating to provide a higher level of cut protection. And the cut protection reaches EN388:2016 Level D.

Excellent Abrasion & Durable - The full-palm nitrile coating with Honeycomb pattern provides excellent grip in both wet and greasy conditions. With reinforced thumb design, abrasion resistance and anti-slip ability are greatly improved, making it ideal for heavy-duty tasks that require reliable hand protection.

Enhanced Breathability - 15 Gauge B.COMB Air technology offers a yet to seen comfort experience.Liners knitted with the B.COMB AIR technique are ultra—lightweight, providing twice the breathability compared to standard knitting. It offers perfect fit for men and women, and reduces hand fatigue. Touchscreen compatible.

Flexibility & Multipurpose - The ergonomically shaped cut proof gloves ensure ease of movement and comfort.Even during prolonged wear, fatigue is minimized,ideal for automotive, machinery and equipment, cargo handling, infrastructure, maintenance, sheet/glass cutting process,and more heavy-duty jobs.
Next-level Performance - LANON nitrile cut resistant gloves are certificated by CE, with Standards EN 388:2016 4X42D, and meet CA Prop.65 regulations for phthalates.

ULTRA-THIN & PROTECTION - When you slide your hand into these cut resistant gloves, you will be struck by their lightweight, snug-fitting design and may question their protective capabilities. But rest assured, the Schwer glove offers serious hand protection for serious professionals who demand best-in-class performance.

SECOND SKIN COMFORT - Featuring state-of-the-art cut-resistant composite yarns, these lightweight, snug-fitting 18-gauge seamless knit gloves offer the closest experience to working barehanded while maintaining protection against cuts, punctures, and abrasion. They are highly flexible at work and well-suited for precision tasks.

CUTTING LEVEL FOR MEDIUM DUTY - These cut proof gloves are rated ANSI A4 cut resistant. This medium level of protection safeguards against significant cutting hazards encountered in tasks such as assembly detail work, package handling, warehouse operations, and wire handling, They are also well-suited for a wide range of applications including woodworking, fishing, construction, Mechanic and gardening.

STRONG GRIP IN ALL CONDITIONS - These cutting gloves feature a sandy nitrile coating. The properties of nitrile rubber—excellent waterproofing, oil resistance, and anti-slip performance—ensure a strong grip in humid, dry, and oily conditions. A reinforced thumb crotch enhances overall durability.

100% SAFE TO USE - These fishing gloves are free from fiberglass—an irritating material that can cause red, itchy rashes upon skin contact. They are 100% safe and guaranteed to be free of PFAS and all other harmful substances. These gloves are an excellent choice for anyone with a fiberglass allergy.

MULTI-PURPOSE UTILITY GLOVES - These safety gloves are excellent fishing gear/equipment/tackle/stuff/tools/accessories/supplies for men and women, They also make a great gift for work, gardening, home, farming, cycling, driving, and mechanical repair.

product_description: Magid’s T-REX® TRX818 Rebel Series® Goatskin Premium Hyperon® Lined Leather Impact Gloves deliver long-lasting comfort and impact protection. These cut and impact resistant gloves feature a premium goatskin leather shell with a gunn cut pattern for superior abrasion resistant gloves with enhanced dexterity. The M-Force Defense System back of hand protection extends all the way to the fingertips to absorb impacts. The Hyperon liner makes these cut resistant impact gloves cool-to-the-touch, leaving hands feeling cool and comfortable throughout tasks. Shirred elastic at the wrist on the back of the work gloves improves the fit and helps the gloves stay on. With a variety of applications including oil and gas rigging and refining, heavy construction, demolition, agriculture, steelwork, and even emergency response, TRX818 oilfield gloves are perfect where comfort, cut resistance, and impact protection are needed. Size 9/L (1 Pair).

name: Schwer 12 Pairs Cut Resistant Work Gloves, CR3066 ANSI A4 Cut Proof Gloves with PU Coating, Touch-Screen, Non Slip, Reinforced Thumb, Durable Working Gloves for Woodworking, Construction, L
short_description: Patented yarn, PU
Imported

ANSI A4 Cut Resistance - The CR3066 work gloves are certified to ANSI/ISEA 105 Cut-Resistance Standard Level A4, tailored specifically for moderate cut-risk scenarios. Crafted with UHMWPE material, they effectively resist slashes from sharp objects like blades, metal edges, and glass shards. They provide reliable hand protection, reducing the risk of injuries in diverse work environments.

Advanced Knitting Technology - The innovative pineapple knit structure boasts a sleek, high-end visual appeal while offering excellent stretch and abrasion resistance, significantly enhancing durability. Free of fiberglass and steel wires, these work gloves eliminate skin itching and allergies caused by fiberglass gloves, and prevent steel wire detachment/residue hazards—seamlessly combining premium quality with environmental friendliness.

Non-Slip & Reinforced - The palm features a PU anti-slip coating, delivering strong grip in dry conditions to avoid slippage when handling smooth metal parts, tools, or wood, thus improving operational precision and safety. The high-stress thumb crotch area adopts double-layer dipped reinforcement, extending service life by over 30%.

Breathable & Touchscreen Compatible- - Made with high-elasticity breathable knitted fabric, the honeycomb ventilation structure accelerates air circulation, keeping hands cool and comfortable even during prolonged wear. With a snug fingertip fit and elastic wristband, fingers move freely for flexible actions like gripping and screwing. Touchscreen-compatible, it allows seamless use of smartphones/tablets without glove removal, boosting work efficiency.

Versatile Applications - 12-pair bulk pack suits personal long-term use, household storage, or small team sharing, while also supporting bulk procurement.. These working gloves are versatile and suitable for various industries, including construction, metal fabrication, gardening, home repairs, glass handling, woodworking, mechanical maintenance, and plumbing.
